message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $10000 to you based on its unique benefits and your specific needs. Considering its high quality and the value it brings to you, I propose to sell it to you for $9000. This offer allows you to acquire an exceptional product at a discounted price, maximizing your savings while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require further information to make a decision.
